Class Capsule

java.lang.Object
cz.dearfuture.models.Capsule
public class Capsule extends Object
Represents a time capsule that stores a message and unlocks at a future date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Capsule

      public Capsule(int id, String title, String message, LocalDateTime unlockDate, String category, String color)
      Constructs a new Capsule.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier of the capsule.
      title - Title of the capsule.
      message - Message stored inside the capsule.
      unlockDate - The date and time when the capsule can be opened.
      category - Category of the capsule (e.g., Reminder, Reflection, Event).

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns:
      The unique ID of the capsule.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Returns:
      The title of the capsule.

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage()
      Returns:
      The message stored inside the capsule if it is opened. Otherwise, returns a locked message.

    • getColor

      public String getColor()
      Returns:
      The color of the capsule.

    • getUnlockDate

      public LocalDateTime getUnlockDate()
      Returns:
      The unlock date of the capsule.

    • getCategory

      public String getCategory()
      Returns:
      The category of the capsule.

    • getDateCreated

      public LocalDateTime getDateCreated()
      Returns:
      The date when the capsule was created.

    • isOpened

      public boolean isOpened()
      Returns:
      true if the capsule has been opened, otherwise false.

    • isDeleted

      public boolean isDeleted()
      Returns:
      true if the capsule has been deleted (moved to Trash), otherwise false.

    • getDeletedAt

      public LocalDateTime getDeletedAt()
      Returns:
      The timestamp when the capsule was deleted, or null if not deleted.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Parameters:
      title - Sets the title of the capsule.

    • setMessage

      public void setMessage(String message)
      Parameters:
      message - Sets the message of the capsule.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(String color)
      Parameters:
      color - Sets the color of the capsule.

    • setUnlockDate

      public void setUnlockDate(LocalDateTime unlockDate)
      Parameters:
      unlockDate - Sets the unlock date of the capsule.

    • setCategory

      public void setCategory(String category)
      Parameters:
      category - Sets the category of the capsule.

    • setOpened

      public void setOpened(boolean opened)
      Parameters:
      opened - Sets whether the capsule is opened.

    • isUnlocked

      public boolean isUnlocked()
      Checks if the capsule is unlocked based on the current date and time.
      Returns:
      true if the capsule is unlocked, otherwise false.

    • openCapsule

      public boolean openCapsule()
      Attempts to open the capsule.
      Returns:
      true if the capsule is successfully opened, otherwise false.

    • deleteCapsule

      public void deleteCapsule()
      Moves the capsule to the Trash (soft delete).

    • restoreCapsule

      public void restoreCapsule()
      Restores the capsule from the Trash.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Capsule object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing capsule details.
